TEXT.English: "Nature herself has imprinted on the minds of all the idea of God." - Cicero
TEXT.Chinese: “自然的一切都有神明的意志留下的烙印。” ——西塞罗

TEXT.English: "Meditation brings wisdom; lack of meditation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what holds you back." - The Buddha
TEXT.Chinese: “静坐冥想带来智慧；缺少冥想必定无知。要明白是什么使人前行，又是什么使人后退。” ——佛陀

TEXT.English: "Not at all similar are the race of the immortal gods and the race of men who walk upon the earth." - Homer
TEXT.Chinese: “诸神在天界永生，人类在地上行走，两者全然不同。” ——荷马

TEXT.English: "The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make His face to shine upon you and be gracious to you; the Lord lift up His countenance upon you and give you peace." - The Bible, Numbers
TEXT.Chinese: “愿主赐福给你，保护你。愿主使他的脸光照你，赐恩给你。愿主向你仰脸，赐你平安。” ——圣经·民数记

TEXT.English: "I am the Lord thy God. Thou shalt have no other gods before Me." - The Bible, Exodus
TEXT.Chinese: “我是耶和华，你的神。除了我以外，你不可有别的神。” ——圣经·出埃及记

TEXT.English: "A multitude of rulers is not a good thing. Let there be one ruler, one king." - Herodotus
TEXT.Chinese: “统治者过多全无益处。一国应当只有一位统治者，一位君王。” ——希罗多德

TEXT.English: "Some books are to be tasted, others to be swallowed, and some few to be chewed and digested." - Sir Francis Bacon
TEXT.Chinese: “书有可浅尝者，有可吞食者，少数则须咀嚼消化。” ——弗朗西斯·培根爵士

TEXT.English: "To bring about the rule of righteousness in the land, so that the strong should not harm the weak." - Hammurabi's Code; Prologue
TEXT.Chinese: “让正义的统治降临大地，使强者不能欺凌弱者。” ——汉谟拉比法典，序言

TEXT.English: "All the world's a stage, And all the men and women merely players. They have their exits and their entrances; And one man in his time plays many parts. " - William Shakespeare
TEXT.Chinese: “全世界是一个巨大的舞台，所有红尘男女均只是演员罢了，上场下场各有其时，每个人一生都扮演着许多角色。” ——威廉·莎士比亚

TEXT.English: "I will to my lord be true and faithful, and love all which he loves and shun all which he shuns." - Anglo Saxon Oath of Fealty
TEXT.Chinese: “我将真诚待奉我的领主，爱他所爱的，恶他所恶的。” ——盎格鲁-撒克逊效忠誓词

TEXT.English: "Two cities have been formed by two loves: the earthly by the love of self; the heavenly by the love of God." - St. Augustine
TEXT.Chinese: “两种爱造就了两座城：自爱所造的尘世之城；神爱所造的天界之城。” ——圣奥古斯丁

TEXT.English: "If music be the food of love, play on." - William Shakespeare
TEXT.Chinese: “如果音乐是爱情的食粮，那么请你继续演奏下去。” ——威廉·莎士比亚

TEXT.English: "People of the same trade seldom meet together, even for merriment and diversion, but the conversation ends in a conspiracy against the public." - Adam Smith
TEXT.Chinese: “同一行业的人聚会，即便是为了嬉戏娱乐，最终必定以针对公众的密谋而结束。” ——亚当·斯密

TEXT.English: "The bureaucracy is expanding to meet the needs of the expanding bureaucracy" - Unknown
TEXT.Chinese: “官僚机构的扩大是为了适应官僚机构扩大的需要。” ——无名氏

TEXT.English: "A man does not have himself killed for a half-pence a day or for a petty distinction. You must speak to the soul in order to electrify him." - Napoleon Bonaparte
TEXT.Chinese: “一个人不会为了每天半个铜币和一点荣誉而付出自己的生命，你必须鼓动他的灵魂才能激发他的斗志。” ——拿破仑·波拿巴

TEXT.English: "Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win." - Sun-Tzu
TEXT.Chinese: “是故胜兵先胜而后求战，败兵先战而后求胜。” ——孙子

TEXT.English: "No freeman shall be taken, imprisoned, or in any other way destroyed, except by the lawful judgment of his peers." - The Magna Carta
TEXT.Chinese: “任何自由人，未经其他自由人之依法判决，皆不得被逮捕，监禁，或加以任何其他损害。” ——英国大宪章

TEXT.English: "Any society that would give up a little liberty to gain a little security will deserve neither and lose both." - Benjamin Franklin
TEXT.Chinese: “任何社会如果宁愿放弃一些自由以获得一些安全，就既不会拥有自由，也不会获得安全。” ——本杰明·富兰克林

TEXT.English: "It has been said that democracy is the worst form of government except all the others that have been tried." - Winston Churchill
TEXT.Chinese: “如果不算其它所有曾经实行过的政体，民主制度就是最糟糕的一种政体。” ——温斯顿·丘吉尔

TEXT.English: "The great masses of the people... will more easily fall victims to a big lie than to a small one." - Adolf Hitler
TEXT.Chinese: “人民大众……更容易被大的谎言，而不是小的谎言所欺骗。” ——阿道夫·希特勒

TEXT.English: "Corporation, n. An ingenious device for obtaining individual profit without individual responsibility." - Ambrose Bierce
TEXT.Chinese: “公司，名词。一种精妙的机构，能带来个人收益，而无须个人负责。” ——安布罗斯·比尔斯（美国作家）

TEXT.English: "When I give food to the poor, they call me a saint. When I ask why the poor have no food, they call me a communist." - Dom Helder Camara
TEXT.Chinese: “当我给穷人食物，他们说我是圣徒，当我问穷人为何没食物，他们说我是共产党。” ——多姆·赫尔德·卡马拉（巴西大主教）

TEXT.English: "The only thing worse than being talked about is not being talked about." - Oscar Wilde
TEXT.Chinese: “比遭人议论更糟糕的唯一一件事就是无人议论。” ——奥斯卡·王尔德

TEXT.English: "We do not inherit the earth from our ancestors, we borrow it from our children" - Native American Song
TEXT.Chinese: “我们的土地并非自祖先手中所继承的，而是从子孙那里所借取的。” ——美洲原住民谚语

TEXT.English: "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." - Lao Tzu
TEXT.Chinese: “授人以鱼，不如授人以渔。” ——老子

TEXT.English: "Put your shoulder to the wheel." - Aesop
TEXT.Chinese: “用你的肩膀扛起车轮。” ——伊索寓言《大力神与车夫》

TEXT.English: "Oh farmers, pray that your summers be wet and your winters clear." - Virgil
TEXT.Chinese: “农夫们啊，我为你们祈求夏季多雨，冬季干燥。” ——维吉尔

TEXT.English: "Hath not the potter power over the clay, to make one vessel unto honor, and another unto dishonor?" - The Bible, Romans
TEXT.Chinese: “匠人难道没有权柄，从一团泥里拿一块作成贵重的器皿，又拿一块作成卑贱的器皿么？” ——圣经·罗马书

TEXT.English: "You can't direct the wind, but you can adjust your sails." - Unknown
TEXT.Chinese: “你不能控制风向，但可以调整风帆。” ——无名氏

TEXT.English: "True glory consists in doing what deserves to be written; in writing what deserves to be read." - Pliny the Elder
TEXT.Chinese: “真正的荣耀在于做值得写的；写值得看的。” ——老普林尼

TEXT.English: "If in other sciences we should arrive at certainty without doubt and truth without error, it behooves us to place the foundations of knowledge in mathematics." - Roger Bacon
TEXT.Chinese: “要使其他学科的内容准确无疑和真实无误，就应当将数学作为所有知识的基础。” ——罗杰·培根（中世纪英国科学家）

TEXT.English: "Words have the power to both destroy and heal. When words are both true and kind, they can change our world." - The Buddha
TEXT.Chinese: “词句有毁灭之力，亦有拯救之能。词句既真且善，便可改变世界。” ——佛陀

TEXT.English: "For everything there is a season and a time for every purpose under heaven." - Ecclesiastes
TEXT.Chinese: “万物皆有定期，凡事都有定时。” ——圣经·传道书

TEXT.English: "Everything is worth what its purchaser will pay for it." - Publius Syrus
TEXT.Chinese: “物品的价值就是买者愿支付的价格。” ——帕布利乌斯·塞鲁斯（叙利亚作家）

TEXT.English: "Astronomy compels the soul to look upwards and leads us from this world to another." - Plato
TEXT.Chinese: “天文学吸引人们仰望上苍，引导我们了解其他的世界。” ——柏拉图

TEXT.English: "I have gained this by philosophy: that I do without being commanded what others do only from fear of the law." - Aristotle
TEXT.Chinese: “我通过哲学了解了这一点：我行事是出于自觉，他人行事只是因为害怕法律。” ——亚里士多德

TEXT.English: "I cannot live without books" - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.Chinese: “没有书我就不能活。” ——托马斯·杰弗逊

TEXT.English: "Banking establishments are more dangerous than standing armies." - Thomas Jefferson
TEXT.Chinese: “银行系统比正规军队更难对付。” ——托马斯·杰弗逊

TEXT.English: "There is no wealth like knowledge, no poverty like ignorance." - Ali ibn Abi-Talib
TEXT.Chinese: “知识即财富，无知即贫穷。” ——阿里·伊本·阿比-塔里布（阿拉伯诗人）

TEXT.English: "What gunpowder did for war, the printing press has done for the mind." - Wendell Phillips
TEXT.Chinese: “正如火药改变了战争的形式，印刷机也改变了思想传播的方式。” ——温德尔·菲利浦斯（美国废奴运动领袖）

TEXT.English: "Compound interest is the most powerful force in the universe." - Albert Einstein
TEXT.Chinese: “复息利率是宇宙中最强大的力量。” ——阿尔伯特·爱因斯坦

TEXT.English: "I do not feel obliged to believe that the same God who has endowed us with sense, reason, and intellect has intended us to forgo their use." - Galileo Galilei
TEXT.Chinese: “我不认为神给予我们感觉、理性和智慧，是为了让我们弃之不用。” ——伽利略奥·伽利略

TEXT.English: "Chemistry means the difference between poverty and starvation and the abundant life." - Robert Brent
TEXT.Chinese: “化学的产生意味着穷困饥馑与富足安康的分野。” ——罗伯特·布伦特

TEXT.English: "To every action there is always opposed an equal reaction." - Isaac Newton
TEXT.Chinese: “每个作用力必定对应一个同样大小的反作用力。” ——艾萨克·牛顿

TEXT.English: "It is not the strongest of the species that survive, but the one most responsive to change." - Charles Darwin
TEXT.Chinese: “物竞天择，适者生存。” ——查尔斯·达尔文

TEXT.English: "As to diseases make a habit of two things - to help, or at least, to do no harm." - Hippocrates
TEXT.Chinese: “对于病人，有两件事要作为惯例 ——一是要救治之，二是至少不要伤害之。” ——希波克拉底（医学之父）

TEXT.English: "We will make electricity so cheap that only the rich will burn candles." - Thomas Edison
TEXT.Chinese: “我们要让电变得无比便宜，以至于只有富人才会点蜡烛。” ——托马斯·爱迪生

TEXT.English: "Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car." - E. B. White
TEXT.Chinese: “要想找寻生活中的一切，你须乘坐一辆小车前往。” ——埃尔文·布鲁克斯·怀特（美国作家）

TEXT.English: If the radiance of a thousand suns were to burst at once into the sky, that would be like the splendor of the Mighty One... I am become Death, the Shatterer of Worlds. - J. Robert Oppenheimer, quoting "The Bhagavad Gita"
TEXT.Chinese: “如果一千颗太阳同时在天空发光，就能彰显造物主的荣耀……我成为了死神，世界的毁灭者。” ——罗伯特·奥本海默，引自《博伽梵歌》

TEXT.English: "For once you have tasted flight you will walk the earth with your eyes turned skywards, for there you have been and there you will long to return." - Leonardo Da Vinci
TEXT.Chinese: “一旦尝试过飞翔的滋味，你就会时刻仰视天空，渴望再次回到那里。” ——列奥纳多·达·芬奇

TEXT.English: "I just want to say one word to you. Just one word: plastics." - Calder Willingham, The Graduate
TEXT.Chinese: “我只想对你说一个词。就一个词：塑料。” ——卡德尔·威灵汉姆，电影《毕业生》

TEXT.English: "The whole is greater than the sum of its parts." - Aristotle
TEXT.Chinese: “整体大于部分之和。” ——亚里士多德

TEXT.English: "Soon it will be a sin for parents to have a child which carries the heavy burden of genetic disease." - Bob Edwards
TEXT.Chinese: “将来如果有父母生下携带严重遗传疾病的孩子，就是犯罪行为。” ——鲍勃·爱德华兹（美国社会学家）

TEXT.English: "There is a single light of science, and to brighten it anywhere is to brighten it everywhere." - Isaac Asimov
TEXT.Chinese: “科学之光只有一束，在任何一处闪耀就可照亮一切。” ——艾萨克·阿西莫夫

TEXT.English: "Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic." - Arthur C. Clarke
TEXT.Chinese: “任何一种足够新颖的技术看起来都象是魔法。” ——亚瑟·克拉克（英国科幻作家）

TEXT.English: "If you chase two rabbits, you will lose them both." - Native American Saying
TEXT.Chinese: “同时追逐两只野兔，你将一无所获。” ——美洲原住民谚语

TEXT.English: "The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones." - Confucius
TEXT.Chinese: “莫入宝山空手回。” ——中国古语（原文谓孔子语“移大山始于运小石”，应为西方人讹传且与采矿科技并不相配）

TEXT.English: "Do not throw the arrow which will return against you." - Kurdish Proverb
TEXT.Chinese: “不要轻易放箭，如果箭会射向你自身。” ——库尔德谚语

TEXT.English: "It is from their foes, not their friends, that cities learn the lesson of building high walls." - Aristophanes
TEXT.Chinese: “是敌人而不是朋友教育我们：城市需要建造高墙。” ——阿里斯托芬

TEXT.English: "It is entirely seemly for a young man killed in battle to lie mangled by the bronze spear. In his death all things appear fair." - Homer
TEXT.Chinese: “带着青铜矛的剌伤战死沙场，是一位年轻人最恰当的归宿。牺牲让他的一切都充满荣光。” ——荷马

TEXT.English: "Blessed shall be the fruit of thy cattle, the increase of thy kine, and the flocks of thy sheep." - The Bible, Deut. 28:4
TEXT.Chinese: “汝家牲畜之生养，牛犊之成长，羊群之繁盛，都必蒙赐福。” ——圣经·申命记 28:4

TEXT.English: "You should hammer your iron when it is glowing hot." - Publius Syrus
TEXT.Chinese: “趁热打铁才能成功。” ——帕布利乌斯·塞鲁斯（叙利亚作家）

TEXT.English: "And them that take the sword shall perish by the sword." - The Bible, Matthew
TEXT.Chinese: “凡动用刀剑者，必死于刀剑之下。” ——圣经·马太福音

TEXT.English: "And on the pedestal these words appear: 'My name is Ozymandias, king of kings: Look on my works, ye Mighty, and despair!' Nothing beside remains." - Percy Bysshe Shelley
TEXT.Chinese: “在那石座上还有这样的铭记：‘我是奥西曼德斯，众王之王：那些所谓强悍者呵，谁能和我的业绩相比！’” ——珀西·拜什·雪莱

TEXT.English: "If you speak the truth, have a foot in the stirrup." - Turkish proverb
TEXT.Chinese: “讲真话的人应该一只脚踩在马镫里。” ——土耳其谚语

TEXT.English: "The wisest men follow their own direction." - Euripides
TEXT.Chinese: “有智慧的人自己选择方向。” ——欧里庇得斯（希腊诗人）
“机器之中有神灵。” ——米南德尔（希腊诗人）

TEXT.English: "A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away." - Antoine de Saint-Exupry
TEXT.Chinese: “设计师知道自己的作品何时达到完美：不是当没有更多的部分可以增加时，而是当没有更多的部分可以删减时。” ——安托瓦尼·德·圣艾修伯里（法国飞行家）

TEXT.English: "One doesn't discover new lands without losing sight of the shore." - Andre Gide
TEXT.Chinese: “不想远离海岸线，就别想发现新陆地。” ——安德烈·纪德（法国小说家）

TEXT.English: "You can get more of what you want with a kind word and a gun than you can with just a kind word." - Al Capone
TEXT.Chinese: “说好话的同时拿把枪，比光说好话更能得到你想要的。” ——艾尔·卡彭（芝加哥黑帮首领）

TEXT.English: "The whole is more than the sum of its parts." - Aristotle
TEXT.Chinese: “整体大于部分之和。” ——亚里士多德

TEXT.English: "Political power grows out of the barrel of a gun." - Mao Zedong
"You would make a ship sail against the winds and currents by lighting a bon-fire under her deck? I have no time for such nonsense." - Napoleon, on Robert Fulton's Steamship
TEXT.Chinese: “你说你造的船凭甲板下面放把火就能顶风逆水航行？我没工夫听这种胡说八道。” ——拿破仑，评论罗伯特·富尔顿的汽船

TEXT.English: "Before that steam drill shall beat me down, I'll die with my hammer in my hand." - from "John Henry, the Steel-Driving Man"
TEXT.Chinese: “若要气钻胜过我，除非我死把锤扔。” ——摘自“约翰·亨利，钢铁一般的人”（美国民谣）

TEXT.English: "I fooled you, I fooled you, I got pig iron, I got pig iron, I got all pig iron." - Lonnie Donegan, "Rock Island Line"
TEXT.Chinese: “我骗了你，我骗了你，我运的是铁，我运的是铁，我运的全都是生铁。” ——罗尼·多内甘，“岩石岛铁路”（蓝调歌手）

TEXT.English: "Artillery adds dignity to what would otherwise be a vulgar brawl." - Frederick the Great
TEXT.Chinese: “火炮提供一种尊严的手段，可以用来代替粗俗的怒骂。” ——腓特烈大帝

TEXT.English: "People can have the Model T in any color - so long as it's black." - Henry Ford
TEXT.Chinese: “顾客可以选择任何颜色的T型车——只要是黑色的。” ——亨利·福特

TEXT.English: "There is one rule for the industrialist and that is: Make the best quality of goods possible at the lowest cost possible, paying the highest wages possible." - Henry Ford
TEXT.Chinese: “工业家必须遵守的规矩：尽可能提高质量，尽可能降低成本，尽可能提高薪水。” ——亨利·福特

TEXT.English: "Then one fine mornin' she puts on a New York station. You know her life was saved by Rock 'n' Roll." - The Velvet Underground, "Rock And Roll"
TEXT.Chinese: “在某天清晨她打开一个纽约电台。你知道拯救了她生命的就是摇滚。” ——地下丝绒，“摇滚”（美国摇滚乐队）

TEXT.English: "Tell me what you eat, and I will tell you what you are." - Anthelme Brillat-Savarin
TEXT.Chinese: “告诉我你喜欢吃什么，我就能了解你的为人。” ——安特姆·布里亚特·萨瓦伦（法国美食家）

TEXT.English: "Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window." - Steve Wozniak
TEXT.Chinese: “不要信赖那些大到不能扔出窗子的计算机。” ——斯蒂夫·沃兹尼亚克（苹果电脑创始人之一）

TEXT.English: "The Earth is the cradle of the mind, but one cannot eternally live in a cradle." - Konstantin E. Tsiolkovsky
TEXT.Chinese: “地球是人类的摇篮，但人不能总是躺在摇篮里面。” ——康斯坦丁·齐奥尔科夫斯基（运载火箭之父）
“哔……哔……哔……哔……” ——伴星一号（第一颗人造卫星）

TEXT.English: "The real problem is not whether machines think, but whether men do." - B.F. Skinner
TEXT.Chinese: “真正的问题不是机器能否思考，而是人能否思考。” ——史金那（美国新行为主义心理学家）

TEXT.English: "The future will be better tomorrow." - Dan Quayle
TEXT.Chinese: “未来将是更美好的明天。” ——丹·奎尔（美国副总统）

TEXT.English: The sun rises on the year %s1_year. Since time immemorial, the %s2_civ people have lived a nomadic life. After years of wandering, they are ready to settle down and found your first city. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader, your people have vested absolute power in you, trusting that you can build a Civilization to stand the test of time!
TEXT.Chinese: 公元%s1_year年第一天的太阳已经升起。在过去的漫长岁月里，%s2_civ先民一直居无定所。而现在他们终于决定结束游牧生活，并为你建造一座城市。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]%s3_leader，你的人民愿意赋予你最高的权力。并坚信你能开创一个历久弥新的文明！

TEXT.English: You have just settled a new city.
Do you wish to give this unit a title?
TEXT.Chinese: 你希望赋予该单位荣誉称号吗?

TEXT.English: Sire, %s1 has become an unhealthy cesspool of filth and vermin! The citizens demand construction of a %s2
TEXT.Chinese: 大人, %s1 的环境污秽不堪! 市民们要求建造 %s2

TEXT.English: Sire, the people %s1 are an unruly lot. Some are even refusing to work! They demand construction of a %s2
TEXT.Chinese: 大人, %s1 的居民刁蛮任性. 许多人拒绝继续工作! 市民们要求建造 %s2

TEXT.English: Very well, do so at the next opportunity.
TEXT.Chinese: 很好, 一有机会就开始建造.
哼! 让他们吃点苦头!

TEXT.English: Wait, let me examine the city first...
TEXT.Chinese: 等等, 让我先查看一下城市...

TEXT.Chinese: %s1 正在产出%s2. 打开下拉菜单改变生产项目.

TEXT.English: %s1 has %d2 unhappy [NUM2:citizen:citizens] and %d3 happy [NUM3:citizen:citizens], for a net happiness of %d4 [NUM4:citizen:citizens].

TEXT.English: %s1 has %d2 good health and %d3 bad health], for a total health of %d4.

“我们的文明现在处于无政府状态！”

TEXT.English: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "We fear for our safety. We demand military protection!"
TEXT.Chinese: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "我们为安全而担心. 我们要更多的军队驻防"

TEXT.English: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "We will not fight with our brothers and sisters in the Faith!"
TEXT.Chinese: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "我们不与和我们同样信仰的兄弟姐妹打仗!"
+%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "我们不会忘记你们残酷的压迫!"
+%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "不, 我们不干! 我们不会去当兵!"

TEXT.English: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "War... What is it good for? Absolutely nothing... Unh!"
TEXT.Chinese: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "战争...这对什么有利? 什么好处都没有...唉!"
+%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "我们渴望有一个开放的国家!"
+%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "这些绿色环保分子都快把我逼疯了!"
+%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "城里有些货物让我很不高兴!"

TEXT.English: +%d1_Change[ICON_UNHAPPY]: "We do not appreciate this type of entertainment!"
+%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "We love this great city of ours!"
TEXT.Chinese: +%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "我们热爱我们的这座伟大的城市!"
+%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "这里的驻军留给我良好的印象!"
+%d1_Change[ICON_HAPPY]: "城里有些建筑物让我们高兴!"

TEXT.English: Will cause %s1_You to Make Peace with %s2_Them.
TEXT.Chinese: 将会导致 %s1_You 与 %s2_Them 签订和平条约.

TEXT.English: Will cause %s1_You to Declare War on %s2_Them.
TEXT.Chinese: 将会导致 %s1_You 向 %s2_Them 宣战.

TEXT.English: Will cause %s1_You to Stop Trading with %s2_Them.
TEXT.Chinese: 将会导致 %s1_You 与 %s2_Them 终止贸易.

TEXT.English: Lump Sum of Gold to be Specified.
TEXT.Chinese: 指定一次支付的金币数量.

TEXT.English: A Specified Amount of Gold Per Turn will be Deducted from the one Civ and Given to the Other.
TEXT.Chinese: 指定每回合支付的金币数量, 这些金币将每回合从一个文明转移到另一个.

TEXT.English: Will Reveal the Map to the Recipient.
TEXT.Chinese: 将会向接受方显示地图.

TEXT.English: Opens the Borders of the Two Civilizations, Generating Commerce from Trade Routes and Allowing Right-of-Passage for Units.
TEXT.Chinese: 打开两个文明间边境, 从贸易线路产生商业收入, 并允许单位的通行权.

TEXT.English: A Mutual Protection Pact - Each Party Agrees to Automatically Declare War if the Other Party is Attacked (Note: This Agreement is Automatically Canceled if Either Civilization Declares War on a Third Party.)
TEXT.Chinese: 这是一个相互保护条约--签约的任何一方在另一方遭受攻击时, 自动宣战. (注意：如果任一方向第三方宣战, 条约自动取消. )

TEXT.English: This Permanent Agreement Joins your Civilizations for the Rest of the Game.
TEXT.Chinese: 这份条约将在剩下的游戏时间内生效.

TEXT.English: Establishes and Unbreakable Peace Treaty for %d1_Num [NUM1:Turn:Turns]
TEXT.Chinese: 签订不可撤销的和平条约 %d1_Num回合

TEXT.English: How much gold would you like to offer?
How much gold would you like from them?
TEXT.Chinese: 你想向他们要多少金币?

TEXT.English: How much gold per turn would you like to offer?
TEXT.Chinese: 你愿给他们多少金币 (每回合)?

TEXT.English: How much gold per turn would you like from them?
TEXT.Chinese: 你想向他们要多少金币 (每回合)?

TEXT.Chinese: 程序需要重新启动, 以使修改生效

TEXT.English: You have trained a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on next?
TEXT.Chinese: 你已组建了以下单位: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT], 地点: %s2_CityName. 接下来你打算做什么?

TEXT.English: You cannot continue training a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on instead?
TEXT.Chinese: 你无法继续组建以下单位: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT], 地点: %s2_CityName. 你打算以什么来代替?

TEXT.English: You have constructed a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on next?
TEXT.Chinese: 你已建造了以下建筑: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT], 地点: %s2_CityName. 接下来你打算做什么?

TEXT.English: You cannot continue constructing a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on instead?
TEXT.Chinese: 你无法继续建造以下建筑: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT], 地点: %s2_CityName. 你打算以什么来代替?

TEXT.English: You have created a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT] in %s2_CityName. What would you like to work on next?
TEXT.Chinese: 你已完成了以下工程: [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_PrjtName[COLOR_REVERT], 地点: %s2_CityName. 接下来你打算做什么?

TEXT.English: What would you like to build in this city?
TEXT.Chinese: 你打算在这座城市建造什么?

TEXT.English: Sire, %s1_CityName has become an unhealthy cesspool of filth and vermin!!! The citizens demand construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName变成了个不健康的城市，充满了污秽和寄生虫!!! 市民们要求建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]!

TEXT.English: Very well, do so at the next opportunity.
Wait, let me examine the city first...
TEXT.Chinese: 等等, 让我先巡视一下城市...

TEXT.English: Sire, the people of %s1_CityName are an unruly lot. Some are even refusing to work!!! They demand construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName 的人民现在变得难以驾驭。有些甚至拒绝工作!!! 他们要求建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]!

TEXT.English: Fine, do so at the next opportunity.
Bah! I spoil them enough already!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 呸！我已经够惯着这帮家伙了!!!

TEXT.Chinese: [SPACE]转变信仰将使所有信仰%F3_RelIcon的城市获得%D1_Change%F2_HappOrUn。

TEXT.English: You have captured %s1_CityName!!! Would you like to keep it?
TEXT.Chinese: 你占领了%s1_CityName!!!你希望保留它吗？
好啊！建立个新的地方政府...

TEXT.Chinese: 让我先看一下详细信息...

TEXT.English: Your society can now implement the civic [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_CivicName[COLOR_REVERT]
. Would you like to start a revolution?
TEXT.Chinese: 政体了。你愿意发动一场革命吗？

TEXT.English: You might want to review some of the civic options available to you.
TEXT.Chinese: 你可能愿意先回顾一下你都拥有哪些政体。

TEXT.English: Yes, let's get this revolution started!
TEXT.Chinese: 好的，让我们开始革命吧!

TEXT.English: No, the old ways are best.
Are you sure you want to %s1_ActionName?
Entering [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_CivAdj[COLOR_REVERT] lands will trigger WAR! Are you sure?
TEXT.Chinese: 进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_CivAdj[COLOR_REVERT]的领土将引发战争！你确定要这么做吗?

TEXT.English: [SPACE](You can peacefully enter if you sign an Open Borders Treaty.)
TEXT.Chinese: [SPACE](如果你签订一份边界开放条约就可以和平地通过.)

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]We have not yet met this Civilization!!![COLOR_REVERT]
It is your current State Religion
TEXT.Chinese: 这是你现在的官方信仰

TEXT.English: ***NO MOUSEOVER TEXT*** Click to Activate Popup.
TEXT.Chinese: ***没有提示文本*** 点击激活弹出框.

TEXT.English: Maintenance Represents the Total Cost of Governening this City.
TEXT.Chinese: 维护费表示管理这个城市的所有费用。

TEXT.English: No Maintenance costs while city is celebrating!
TEXT.Chinese: 城市举行庆典期间没有维护费用!

TEXT.English: ***** OUT OF SYNC! MY SYNC SEED = %d1_Sync : MY OPTIONS SEED = %d2_Options *****[NEWLINE]
TEXT.Chinese: ***** 无法同步! 当前同步种子= %d1_Sync : 当前选择种子 = %d2_Options *****[NEWLINE]

TEXT.English: %s1_GPName has been born in a far away land!
An unknown city has achieved %s1_LevelName Culture!
TEXT.Chinese: 一座远方城市达到了%s1_LevelName文化等级!

TEXT.English: %s1_WndrName has been built in a far away land!
%s1_CityName can no longer work on %s2_BldgName. The lost [ICON_PRODUCTION] is converted into %d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_CityName无法继续建造%s2_BldgName. 已积累的[ICON_PRODUCTION]将转换为%d3_NumGold[ICON_GOLD]!

TEXT.English: %s1_RelName has been founded in a distant land!
You have pillaged %d1_Num [ICON_GOLD] from the destruction of %s2_CityName!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 你劫掠了%d1_Num [ICON_GOLD], 并将%s2_CityName化为废墟!!!

TEXT.English: You have destroyed the city of %s1_CityName!!!
%s1_UnitName was disbanded because of a lack of funds!
The anarchy is over! Your government is re-established.
TEXT.Chinese: 无政府状态结束了! 你的政府已完成重组.

TEXT.English: The enemy has been spotted near %s1_CityName!
You have discovered a source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName!
A %s1_CivAdj revolt has taken place in %s2_CityName!
%s1_PlyrName has made a Permanent Alliance with %s2_TeamName!
What would you like to research next?
You have discovered a source of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_BonusName[COLOR_REVERT] near %s2_CityName!
Your Civilization is the first to discover [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1_TechName[COLOR_REVERT]! Choose a free technology...
TEXT.Chinese: 你的文明率先发现了[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]%s1_TechName[COLOR_REVERT]! 可以选择一项免费科技...

TEXT.English: A distant civilization is the first to discover %s1_TechName!
TEXT.Chinese: 某个遥远的文明率先发现了%s1_TechName!

TEXT.English: You have circumnavigated the Globe! Your ships receive a %D1_Change Movement bonus!
TEXT.Chinese: 你完成了环球航行! 你的船只将获得%D1_Change移动力奖励!

TEXT.English: %s1_PlyrName is the first to circumnavigate the Globe!
A distant Civilization has circumnavigated the Globe!
TEXT.Chinese: 某个遥远的文明完成了环球航行!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT] has been created in a far away land!
Your forces are under attack by %s1_player!
Your %s1_UnitName has died trying to attack a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName在攻击敌方%s2_EnUName的战斗中被消灭!

TEXT.English: While defending, your %s1_UnitName has killed a %s3_owner_adjective %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName在执行防御任务时消灭了%s3_owner_adjective的%s2_EnUName!

TEXT.English: While defending, your %s1_UnitName was destroyed by a %s3_owner_adjective %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName在执行防御任务时被%s3_owner_adjective的%s2_EnUName所消灭!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has withdrawn from combat with a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName在与敌方的%s2_EnUName作战时撤退!

TEXT.English: A %s1_EnUName has withdrawn from combat with your %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.Chinese: 敌方的%s1_EnUName在与你的%s2_UnitName的作战时撤退!

TEXT.English: %s1_PlyrName launches a %s2_UnitName, but it is shot down by %s3_Plyr2Name!!!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_PlyrName发射了一枚%s2_UnitName, 但是被%s3_Plyr2Namer拦截!!!
%s1_PlyrName发射了一枚%s2_UnitName, 并成功引爆!!!

TEXT.English: %s3_player has reduced your defenses in %s1_CityName to %d2_NewVal%%!
TEXT.Chinese: %s3_player的攻击使我方%s1_CityName的防御能力降至%d2_NewVal%%!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has reduced the defenses of %s2_CityName to %d3_NewVal%%!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName攻击使%s2_CityName的防御能力降至%d3_NewVal%%!

TEXT.English: A %s1_ImpName has been destroyed by a marauding %s3_civ_adjective %s2_UnitName!

TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName在%s2_CityName附近进行暗中破坏!!!

TEXT.English: We have heard reports of sabotage near %s1_CityName!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们获知%s1_CityName附近遭到敌人暗中破坏!!!
我们抓获了%s1_CivAdj的%s2_UnitName并将其“清理”掉了!!!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName was caught and "detained for questioning"!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName被抓获, 并被“拘留审察”!!!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has destroyed the production of %s2_ProdName in %s3_CityName!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName成功破坏了%s2_ProdName工程, 地点: %s3_CityName!!!

TEXT.English: The production of %s1_ProdName in %s2_CityName has been destroyed!!!
Your %s1_UnitName has stolen military plans from %s2_CityName!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName成功窃得一份军事计划, 地点: %s2_CityName!!!

TEXT.English: Your military plans have been stolen from %s1_CityName!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的军事计划被敌方窃取, 地点: %s1_CityName!!!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has failed to spread %F2_RelIcon in %s3_CityName!!!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName传播%F2_RelIcon的努力遭到失败, 地点: %s3_CityName!!!
你的部队遭受附带伤害!(%d1_Num个单位)
你的%s1_UnitName给敌军造成附带伤害!(%d2_Num个单位)

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName was shot down by an enemy %s2_EnUName!
Your %s1_UnitName was intercepted by an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3%% Damage)
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName遭到敌方%s2_EnUName的拦截(%d3%%损伤)

TEXT.English: Your defenses in %s1_CityName have been reduced to %d2_Num%% by a %s3_UnitName!
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_CityName的防御能力降至%d2_Num%%, 由于敌方%s3_UnitName的攻击!

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has reduced the defenses of %s2_CityName to %d3_Num%%!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName攻击使%s2_CityName的防御能力降至%d3_Num%%!

TEXT.English: A %s1_ImpName has been destroyed by a %s3_civ_adjective %s2_UnitName!
Your %s1_UnitName has failed to destroy the %s2_ImpName!
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName未能成功摧毁敌方的%s2_ImpName!
叮铃铃铃铃! 现在时间: %s1_TimeStr.

TEXT.English: Alarm will go off at %s1_AlrmTime. Time is now %s2_CurrTime.
TEXT.Chinese: 闹钟会在 %s1_AlrmTime 关掉. 现在是: %s2_CurrTime.

TEXT.English: How do you want the World to form?
How big should the World be?
What kind of climate should the World have?
How deep should the oceans be?
How fast should the game be?
The civilization chosen is random. You will start the game with techs and units based on the civilization that is chosen for you.
TEXT.Chinese: 随机选择文明. 具体初始科技与特色单位以所选文明为准.
系 统 错 误

TEXT.English: Could not resolve connection manager host name.
An email address is required to create a new account.
TEXT.Chinese: 创建帐号需要电子邮件地址.

TEXT.English: A unique nickname must be provided.

TEXT.Chinese: %s1 提供%s2 给予%s3 换取%s4

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName was attacked by an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName单位遭到敌方%s2_EnUName攻击! (损伤%d3_Damage%%)

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has attacked an enemy %s2_EnUName! (%d3_Damage%% Damage)
TEXT.Chinese: 你的%s1_UnitName攻击了敌方的%s2_EnUName! (损伤%d3_Damage%%)

TEXT.English: This deal can be canceled in %d1 [NUM1:turn:turns]
TEXT.Chinese: 这笔交易将在%d1回合后取消

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] for having %s2_religion as a State Religion

TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%%[ICON_PRODUCTION] 由于建造太空飞船部件
[ICON_BULLET]%D1[ICON_PRODUCTION] 来自当前建造项目剩余

TEXT.English: You have completed %s1_BldgName! Choose a free technology...
TEXT.Chinese: 你完成了%s1_BldgName! 请选择一项免费科技...

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]Total costs before Inflation = %d1[ICON_GOLD][NEWLINE]Inflation Rate = %d2%%[NEWLINE]Cost due to Inflation (%d3%% of %d4[ICON_GOLD]) = %d5[ICON_GOLD]
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE]不考虑通货膨胀的总花费 = %d1[ICON_GOLD][NEWLINE]通货膨胀率 = %d2%%[NEWLINE] 通货膨胀增加的花费(%d3%%*%d4[ICON_GOLD]) = %d5[ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE]%d3[ICON_GOLD]: Military Unit cost for %d1 units (free support for %d2)
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE]%d3[ICON_GOLD]: %d1个军事单位的总花费 (免费维持数量%d2)

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE](<CTRL> for All Cities on this Continent)
[NEWLINE](<ALT> for All Cities in the World)

TEXT.Chinese: 工人自动工作时不改建旧有设施
%D1: "这场战争损害了我们的关系."

TEXT.English: %D1: "Years of peace have strengthened our relations."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "多年的和平加强了我们的关系."

TEXT.English: %D1: "We care for our brothers and sisters of the faith."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "我们关爱信仰同一宗教的兄弟姊妹."

TEXT.English: %D1: "We are upset that you have fallen under the sway of a heathen religion."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "我们因你的异端信仰而深感不满."

TEXT.English: %D1: "We appreciate the years you have supplied us with resources."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "我们感谢你们多年来提供资源."

TEXT.English: %D1: "Our Open Borders have brought our people close together."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "我们的开放边界条约加强了两国人民的联系."

TEXT.English: %D1: "Our Defensive Pact proves that we are close friends."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "我们的共同防御条约使我们成为亲密的朋友."

TEXT.English: %D1: "We are upset that you have signed Defensive Pacts with our rivals."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "我们因你与我们的敌人签订共同防御条约而深感不满."

TEXT.English: %D1: "Our mutual military struggle brings us closer together."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "我们因并肩作战而形成更密切的关系."
%D1: "你对内政法令的选择非常明智."

TEXT.English: %D1: "Our trade relations have been fair and forthright."
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "我们间的贸易活动是公平互利的."

TEXT.English: %D1: "You have traded with our worst enemies!"
TEXT.Chinese: %D1: "你与我们最坏的敌人开展贸易活动!"

TEXT.English: %s1_Name would like to add you as a buddy
"Sorry... we're not willing to trade this."
TEXT.Chinese: “抱歉……我们不愿意拿这个做交易。”

TEXT.English: "You'll have to take it from our cold, dead hands."
TEXT.Chinese: “除非杀死我，否则别想得到它。”

TEXT.English: "We don't want to deal with the unhappiness."
"That would go against everything we stand for!"
TEXT.Chinese: “这将违背我们所信奉的原则！”

TEXT.English: "Too few of our people follow that faith..."
TEXT.Chinese: “我们国家很少有人信仰那种宗教……”

TEXT.English: "We'd love to, but you'll have to contact them..."
TEXT.Chinese: “我们很乐意，不过你们得先联系他们……”

TEXT.English: "We'd rather win the game, thank you very much..."
TEXT.Chinese: “我们更乐意赢得胜利，多谢你……”
“我们不能背叛我们最亲密的朋友！”

TEXT.English: "We fear you are becoming too advanced."
"We don't want to start trading away this technology just yet."
TEXT.Chinese: “我们现在不想交易这项科技。”

TEXT.English: "We have enough on our hands right now."
"We haven't had a defensive pact or shared a war for long enough."
TEXT.Chinese: “我们没有共同防御协定，也没有共同长期作战的经历。”

TEXT.English: "Not right now... maybe we'll change our mind in a few years."
TEXT.Chinese: “现在不行……也许再过几年我们会改变主意。”
“你用核武器攻击我们的朋友！”
“你的间谍被捕，引发了紧张情势！”

TEXT.English: "You refused to accept our state religion!"

TEXT.Chinese: “你实行我们喜欢的内政法令。”

TEXT.English: "You refused to accept our favorite civic!"
TEXT.Chinese: “你拒绝实行我们喜欢的内政法令！”

TEXT.English: "You agreed to come to our aid in war-time."
TEXT.Chinese: “你同意在战时给予我们援助。”

TEXT.English: "You refused to help us during war-time!"
TEXT.Chinese: “你拒绝在战时给予我们援助！”

TEXT.English: "You agreed to stop trading with our worst enemy."
TEXT.Chinese: “你同意停止与我们最坏的敌人的贸易。”

TEXT.English: "You refused to stop trading with our worst enemy."
TEXT.Chinese: “你拒绝停止与我们最坏的敌人的贸易。”
“最近你停止了与我们的贸易！”
“你取消了我们之间的开放边界条约！”

TEXT.English: "You have shared your technological discoveries with us."
TEXT.Chinese: “你同我们分享你的科技成果。”

TEXT.English: "You received a tech from another civilization."
TEXT.Chinese: “你从另一个文明获得了一项科技。”
基准历史伟人出现几率 = %D1[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
实际历史伟人出现几率 = %D1[ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

TEXT.English: A Nuclear Meltdown has occurred in %s1_CityName!!!
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Can only Hurry Production of a Unit or a Building.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]只能用于加速建造单位或建筑.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Are you sure you wish to cancel this deal?
TEXT.Chinese: 你确定你要取消这项交易?

TEXT.English: Hrmmm, perhaps we should rethink this?
TEXT.Chinese: 嗯, 也许我们应该再考虑考虑?

TEXT.English: This deal cannot currently be canceled.
TEXT.Chinese: 该交易当前不能被取消.
输入玩家 %s1_player 的电子邮件地址

TEXT.English: Sire, %s1_CityName is unprotected, leaving it at great risk. The training of a defensive unit ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT]) would appease the worried citizens!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName毫无防护，这是很危险的。训练([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT])单位进行防御可使忧虑的市民感到安心！

TEXT.English: Sire, the city of %s1_CityName has much unimproved land. The training of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT] could help it become much more productive!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName有大量未开发土地。训练[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s2_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT]单位将会使它更具生产效率！

TEXT.English: Sire, our great Civilization is ready to expand! The training of a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT] will allow us to build more cities, spreading our influence far and wide!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，我们伟大的文明将要扩张了！训练[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]%s1_UnitName[COLOR_REVERT]单位将使我们可以建造更多的城市，将我们的影响传播得更远更广！

TEXT.English: Sire, the defenses of %s1_CityName are very weak, making us an inviting target! Remember, good fences make good neighbors. The construction of [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] would give our people safety at last!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName的防御过于薄弱，这使我们成了一块诱人的肥肉！记住,好的防御会让你有好的邻居。建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]将会给我们的人民带来安全！

TEXT.English: Sire, the maintenance of %s1_CityName is costing us a great deal, a result of our empire's expansive growth! The construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] would be wise indeed!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName市的维持费太过高昂，这是我们帝国膨胀过快的结果！建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]会是个真正聪明的主意！

TEXT.English: Sire, %s1_CityName is not producing any culture - this would expand our borders, bringing more of the world under our command! The construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] would let the culture flow!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName尚未开始积累文化点数——文化可以扩张我们的国界，为我们带来更多可以建造的奇观！建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]将会让我们的文化点数快速增长！

TEXT.English: Sire, %s1_CityName is producing a great deal of gold for our treasury! We should consider constructing a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] to increase the output even more, making us all very, very rich!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName正在为我们的国库提供大量的财富！我们应该建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]以让我们的产出更多，让我们变得非常非常富有！

TEXT.English: Sire, %s1_CityName is a great center of scholarship and research! The construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] would take advantage of this fact by increasing the science output to even higher levels!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName是个伟大的学者和科研的中心！建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]将使我们更充分地利用这一优势，把我们的科研能力提到更高的水平！

TEXT.English: Sire, %s1_CityName is a coastal city - it should reap the fruits of the sea! The construction of a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT] would increase its growth significantly!
TEXT.Chinese: 阁下，%s1_CityName是座滨海城市——它可以获取来自海洋的资源！建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_BldgName[COLOR_REVERT]将极大地增加它的产出！

TEXT.English: Fine, do so at the next opportunity.
TEXT.Chinese: 很好, 下一个项目就做.

TEXT.English: Forget it, I'm the one in charge here!
TEXT.Chinese: 不行, 这里我说了算!

TEXT.English: Wait, let me examine the city first...
TEXT.Chinese: 等等, 先巡视一下城市...
